1.name: Warborne
1.details: Each time Warmonger takes or deals damage to enemy Hero, he gains a stack of Warborne for a short duration. Each stack of Warborne grants Warmonger increased life steal (maximum 10 stacks).

2.name: Decimate
2.details:
Warmonger gains increased movement speed for a duration and his next basic attack deals additional physical damage (scaling with physical power) to the target.

At maximum stack of Warborne, Decimate deals additional physical damage based on the target’s maximum health.

3.name: War Cry
3.details:
Warmonger rallies, increasing his and nearby allies’ physical power over a duration.

At maximum stacks of Warborne, War Cry also increases Warmonger’s armour penetration.

4.name: Scorching Edge
4.details:
Warmonger swings up his glaive to send out a flaming wave in a target direction, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit and slowing them for a short duration.

At maximum stacks of Warborne, Scorching Edge’s range and slow effect increase.

5.name: Arena of Blood
5.details:
Warmonger picks a target enemy Hero, then slams down his glaive and creates an arena around him. Inside the arena, he instantly gains maximum stacks of Warborne.

Enemy heroes cannot walk out or into the arena.

Whoever gets out of the arena before it ends while the other party is still alive will be marked as Coward. Coward takes increased damage from the winner of the duel for a duration.

If Warmonger wins the duel, he will activate Battle Cry or reset its duration if Battle Cry is already active.
